channel.title: Coords?
channel.description:
is there an easy way to find coords for caves, dungeons, etc.?
and also:
[size=15pt]CAN SOME1 PLEASE GIVE ME THE COORDS 4 THE REAL MOD ISLAND?[/size]
i mean mod island as in the large testing ground place that i believe jagex uses for testing new updates, but i'm not sure.

item.title: Coords?
item.dc:creator: @daraman2000 daraman2000
item.description:
@daraman2000 wrote:

i know that, but how can i code a ladder when i dont know where the coresponding dungeon or cave is?

Read full topic

item.title: Coords?
item.dc:creator: @samcanbam samcanbam
item.description:
@samcanbam wrote:

daraman2000:

…ladders dont work on private servers…

yes they do’, you just have to code it in.

Read full topic

item.title: Coords?
item.dc:creator: @PatScape PatScape
item.description:
@PatScape wrote:

Well first of all, if you’ve played the real game, you can find the dungeons. I don’t know how else to find the coords of them. And yes, the real 126. What you saw was probably just a player made mod island. Just spawn some npcs, create shops, monsters, monster drops… That’s all they really are, nothing special.

Read full topic

item.title: Coords?
item.dc:creator: @daraman2000 daraman2000
item.description:
@daraman2000 wrote:

but i cant just guess where in the 10000 of coordinates the dungeons are, and also, about mod island, i saw it on a video once, but wat do u mean by world 126? the real RS world?

Read full topic

item.title: Coords?
item.dc:creator: @PatScape PatScape
item.description:
@PatScape wrote:

First of all, just log in and find the dungeon. It displays the coords in the emote tab. Second, there is no REAL mod island. The closest thing to that is world 126.

Read full topic
